Title: Authorizes the posting by each municipality of turtle crossing signs on local roads located within such municipality
Summary: Authorizes the posting by each municipality of turtle crossing signs on local roads located within such municipality; empowers the state commissioner of transportation to develop and implement rules and regulations authorizing municipalities to post turtle crossing signs on local roads located within the municipality.
LawCode: Add ยง72-s, Gen Muni L; amd ยง14, Transp L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to authorizing the posting by each municipality of turtle crossing signs on local roads located within such municipality; and to amend the transportation law, in relation to empowering the state commissioner of transportation to develop and implement rules and regulations authorizing each municipality to post turtle crossing signs on local roads located within such municipality
